ai-iti14:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti14:2.1_0: “Mendicants, I do not see a single hindrance, hindered by which people wander and transmigrate for a long time like the hindrance of ignorance.
ai-iti14:2.2_0: Hindered by ignorance, people wander and transmigrate for a long time.”
ai-iti14:4.1_0: Those who have given up delusion,
ai-iti14:4.4_0: the root is not found in them.”
ai-iti14:5.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
